program.name: SLO Dashboard RenderX-Web Traceability Integration
program.goal: Integrate production RenderX-Web telemetry + log lineage + test coverage + shape evolution governance directly into SLO dashboard orchestration sequences and overlays.
principles: Governance evolves only via generated JSON (no manual report edits)
Every sequence phase mapped to at least one telemetry + BDD + shape artifact
Drift detection enforced pre-merge (shape + coverage + lineage)
Incremental enhancement in demo-able vertical slices
Stable IDs (sequenceId, shapeHash, coverageId, lineageId) for correlation

phaseCoveragePercent.description: All SLO dashboard orchestration phases have telemetry + test + BDD mapping

telemetryToTestMappingRatio.description: ≥85% production events exercised in test mapping

driftResolutionTimeMinutes.description: Avg time from drift detection to annotation

overlayProposalPromotion.description: All ready orchestration sequence proposals promoted

sprints.name: Baseline Linkage & Sequence Hooks
objectives: Load existing RenderX-Web telemetry + lineage into SLO dashboard context
Attach sequence phase → telemetry event mapping (activation, breach-detect, report-emission phases)
Generate initial integration manifest linking domain authority → sequence → telemetry → BDD spec

tasks.desc: Ingest RenderX-Web telemetry anomalies into slo-dashboard enrichment step
Map sequence phases → event IDs (phase metadata extension)
Patch slo-dashboard domain authority with manifest reference

acceptanceCriteria: Domain authority validates with new integration schema
Demo script outputs coverage summary + phase linkage

sprints.name: Coverage & Shape Evolution Coupling
objectives: Integrate coverageId into each mapped telemetry event
Annotate new shape hashes triggered by SLO sequence events
deliverables: shape-evolutions.json new annotations for SLO features

tasks.desc: Add coverage extraction for SLO test suites
Link coverageId to telemetry anomalies in manifest
Run shape-diff-check in CI pipeline for slo-dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: Zero unannotated shape diffs at end of sprint

sprints.name: Overlay Promotion & BDD Synchronization
objectives: Promote ready orchestration sequence proposals tied to SLO events
Ensure BDD specs reference all promoted sequence phases
Add BDD scenario → telemetry event cross index

tasks.desc: Inject phase scenario scaffolds into BDD spec

acceptanceCriteria: BDD spec lists scenario for each sequence phase

sprints.name: Governance & Drift Enforcement
objectives: Add automated drift guard for manifest vs sequence vs BDD vs shape
acceptanceCriteria: Domain authorities validate with new block
Drift verifier identifies forced test omission (simulate)

sprints.name: Correlation & Insights Expansion
objectives: Add multi-feature correlation (SLO + Self-Healing + Telemetry Pipeline)
Provide anomaly root-cause hints (component lineage + coverage fingerprint)
Expose REST/CLI to query traceability manifest
acceptanceCriteria: Correlation map lists ≥3 cross-feature anomaly linkages
